For comparison between technologies, compare on basis of dry biomass (as energy cost of drying is same for all technologies, so cancels out)
based on average base:ash ratio of straw, wood,husk,shell,plant from phyllis 2.
18.74/19.95 conversion factor from HHV to LHV based on mean from phyllis 2 database
